text.p: This is very boring text that as boring markup as well: strong, struck, emphasized, underlined, subtextm supertext, KNORA, internal link,
text.pre: He will speak these words of wisdom Like a sage, a man of vision Though he knows he’s really nothing But the brief elaboration of a tube
text.blockquote: Digital data created during research that might be valuable for other ongoing or future research projects can be transfered to the DaSCH infrastructre. The DaSCH will preserve the data and provide long-term access.
